author: theblock.co
title: BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF becomes fastest to hit $70 billion, crushing gold’s previous record
description: The firm's spot Bitcoin fund, the largest of its kind, passed $70 billion in AUM in 341 of trading, five times faster than a gold fund.
content:
The firm's spot Bitcoin fund, the largest of its kind, passed $70 billion in AUM in 341 of trading, five times faster than a gold fund.
This story appeared on theblock.co, 2025-06-09 16:22:09.
